This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

Product Description

Safe to Use

Plug the light into any outlet or power source to use the fairy lights.There is a button on the plug that you can use to change the lighting mode and turn the light on and off.

Timer Function

The lights will automatically turn on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours.

9 x Fixing nails included

With fixing nails included in the package, you can easily fix the light string to the lawn.

8 Lighting Modes

This Christmas light has 8 lighting modes: Combination, In Waves, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing/ Flash, Slow Fade, Twinkle/ Flash, Steady On.

Memory Function

With the memory function, the string light remembers the last mode. If you like the lighting modes which set up last time, and you don’t need to change the mode when turn on the light again.

Perfect Decoration

This is a good helper for Christmas decoration, you can decorate the house, Christmas tree, etc. It is also an excellent gift for your family and friends.

【8 Lighting Modes】：Combination, In Waves, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing/ Flash, Slow Fade, Twinkle/ Flash, Steady On. Press the button on the plug to change to your favorite modes, plug and play.
【IP44 Waterproof】：IP44 waterproof rating Christmas light withstands the weather like rain and snow and can be used outdoors. Note: The plug is not waterproof.
【Safe Guarantee】：UL certified and compatible with most USA standard sockets. It will not overheat even if it works for a long time, safe to touch.
【A Helper for Christmas Decoration】：This Christmas decoration star Icicle Light with a charming lighting effect is a perfect decoration for the Christmas tree, lawn, and courtyard.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {

onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

offlineStoreName.value = ”;

offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,

offlineYear,

);

Price: $6.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:24:52 UTC – Details)


The UNO matching card game everyone loves goes to a galaxy far, far away with this special Star Wars edition. Featuring both classic and newer characters spanning the movies of the beloved Skywalker Saga, it also includes “The Force” wild card unique to this deck. Players aim to get rid of all their cards by matching a card in their hand with the current card shown on top of the discard pile. When players are down to one card, they must prove that the Force is with them by shouting “UNO!” This edition of the family-favorite card game makes a great gift for players 7 years and older, especially Star Wars fans. Colors and decorations may vary.
It’s the classic UNO card game everyone loves, now pitting the forces of the Light Side and the Dark Side against each other! Perfect for Younglings and Master Jedi alike, ages 7 years and older.
Each card is decorated with an iconic image from the Star Wars franchise, including classic characters from the original trilogy, the prequels and the sequels -a great collector’s edition!
Just like in the classic UNO game, players match cards by color or number in a race to empty their hand.
Includes an exclusive wild “The Force” card. Play it, choosing another player and a color. If that player has at least one card of that color, they are forced to draw 2 cards. If they don’t, play just continues with the chosen color.
UNO Star Wars makes a great gift for Star Wars fans of all ages.

5
Price: $6.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:24:52 UTC – Details)

Christmas Star Waterfall String Lights – Indoor and Outdoor Decor

Outdoor waterfall star string lights will light up your Christmas and holidays! Comes with 16.4′ extension cord, upgraded 11″ Iron Top Star and 9 strands of 10′ long string lights. You can hang this meteor Christmas light on your roof or tree top. Perfect for decorating Christmas trees, backyards, porches, patios, gardens, walls, windows, bedrooms, living rooms, weddings and parties, etc. It is also an ideal gift for family and friends.

What makes us stand out
more durable material (won’t break)
Longer lasting (lasts at least 10 vacations)
Neat wires won’t get crimped or twisted
Energy saving (almost no power consumption)
Safer (UL listed, low voltage output, cool to the touch)
Suitable for indoor and outdoor (IP44 waterproof)
feature:

8 Lighting Modes: Combo, Wave, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chase/Flash, Slow Fade, Blink/Flash and Always On

Christmas, Wedding, Engagement, New Year, Valentine’s Day, Anniversary, Birthday Party, Sweet Emotions and more

This is a set of weatherproof string lights designed for inclement weather and suitable for all seasons. But be aware that the plugs are not waterproof, you’ll need to do some protection or keep them out of the water.

Good choice for Christmas
【8 Lighting Modes】Christmas Waterfall Lights have 8 different light modes: Combination, Wave, Sequential, Slow Glow, Chasing/Blinking, Slow/Fader, Blinking/Blinking, Steady Lighting Like a beautiful star falling on you in front of. What’s even more amazing is that the stars can twinkle from the bottom up, and you can enjoy a meteor shower feast on Christmas!
【Powerful Memory Function】The Christmas waterfall light has a memory function. The built-in memory chip will save your last mode setting, no need to reset the mode every time, when you restart, the memory function will be restored from the previous setting mode. How convenient!
【EASY TO USE AND SAFE】Just hang the big star on the exterior wall, tree or eaves, then hang the 9 star string lights to the ground. Then we unfold each light wire and fix it to the ground. It’s that easy! The UL listed plug and low temperature LED bulb ensure it is safe to touch even after prolonged use. Save you time and effort. Safer to use!
【Waterfall light for multiple scenes】: Waterfall light is IP44 outdoor waterproof design, it can work normally even in cold winter. This large LED outdoor Christmas decoration can be hung on eaves, porches and trees. Perfect for Christmas decorations, Thanksgiving, Weddings, Valentine’s Day and more. This is the most classic style, illuminates eaves, trees, walls, decks, balconies, Christmas trees to create a charming atmosphere.
【No Risk Investment】Our products will surely attract your love after continuous improvement. If you have any questions, you can contact us by email. We will give you a satisfactory answer within 24 hours. If you don’t think your investment today is worth a penny, we’ll give you a full refund.

5
Price: $31.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:12 UTC – Details)

Product Description

21in 12Pack Candy Cane Christmas Pathway Markers Lights with Stake

8 Models

Christmas candy cane pathway lights modes include fixed, blinking / flashing, slowly fading, chase / flashing, wave, combination, sequence, and progressive.

Red Light

Upgraded red and white candy lights come with 2 different styles of Christmas pendants (snowman and star), and the red lights are more cozy

Easy to Install

you just need to insert the stakes into the candy cane tubes, secure the cane lights firmly and choose the right spacing for the cane lights respectively.

IP44 Waterproof

These candy cane lights are mains powered, remains safe and luminous in rainy and snowy days, cast a classic Christmas silhouette.

Light Color
red and white multicolor none

Power Supply
plug in plug in none

12 pack Christmas outdoor decor: Each light up candy canes 21 inches high with 6 LEDs, space between each candy light: 50 cm/19.7 inches, plug lead length 3 meters/9.8 feet, total length 7.5 meters/24.6 feet, including 72 LED bulbs. With IP44 waterproof rating, lighted candy canes outdoor are suitable for indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations, and can withstand rain, sun or snow without worrying about short circuit or weather damage when using.
8 Adjustment Modes: Candy cane led lights can be adjusted by adjusting the buttons on the configured adapter to meet your needs for different holidays and different lighting effects.Christmas candy cane pathway lights plugged into the power supply, press the controller to adjust the mode, once you press the controller, 8 modes can be automatically switched.
Easy Installation: The candy cane yard lights come with sturdy stakes, you just need to insert the stakes into the candy cane tubes, secure the cane lights firmly and choose the right spacing for the cane lights respectively. Each light set comes with end-to-end plugs and stackable plugs that can be connected to up to multiple sets, giving you more options to decorate your yard!
Multiple scene: Sidewalk Candy cane lights can be placed neatly on the ground, in snowdrifts, in potted plants, or hung on fences, handrails, eaves, windowsills and mantels, or even decorate your Christmas tree.Light up candy canes outdoor are also great for creative gift-giving, send your kids to your elders and they will surely have a memorable Christmas day.

Product Description

21in 12Pack Candy Cane Christmas Pathway Markers Lights with Stake

8 Models

Christmas candy cane pathway lights modes include fixed, blinking / flashing, slowly fading, chase / flashing, wave, combination, sequence, and progressive.

Red Light

Upgraded red and white candy lights come with 2 different styles of Christmas pendants (snowman and star), and the red lights are more cozy

Easy to Install

you just need to insert the stakes into the candy cane tubes, secure the cane lights firmly and choose the right spacing for the cane lights respectively.

These candy cane lights are mains powered, remains safe and luminous in rainy and snowy days, cast a classic Christmas silhouette.

Light Color
red and white multicolor none

Power Supply
plug in plug in none

12 pack Christmas outdoor decor: Each light up candy canes 21 inches high with 6 LEDs, space between each candy light: 50 cm/19.7 inches, plug lead length 3 meters/9.8 feet, total length 7.5 meters/24.6 feet, including 72 LED bulbs. With IP44 waterproof rating, lighted candy canes outdoor are suitable for indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations, and can withstand rain, sun or snow without worrying about short circuit or weather damage when using.
8 Adjustment Modes: Candy cane led lights can be adjusted by adjusting the buttons on the configured adapter to meet your needs for different holidays and different lighting effects.Christmas candy cane pathway lights plugged into the power supply, press the controller to adjust the mode, once you press the controller, 8 modes can be automatically switched.
Easy Installation: The candy cane yard lights come with sturdy stakes, you just need to insert the stakes into the candy cane tubes, secure the cane lights firmly and choose the right spacing for the cane lights respectively. Each light set comes with end-to-end plugs and stackable plugs that can be connected to up to multiple sets, giving you more options to decorate your yard!
Multiple scene: Sidewalk Candy cane lights can be placed neatly on the ground, in snowdrifts, in potted plants, or hung on fences, handrails, eaves, windowsills and mantels, or even decorate your Christmas tree.Light up candy canes outdoor are also great for creative gift-giving, send your kids to your elders and they will surely have a memorable Christmas day.

Instantly enjoy endless entertainment with the Impecca 32” Frameless LED TV! Experience breathtaking picture quality for stunning clarity, deep contrast, and vivid colors. Watch movies and TV shows come to life. Dolby Vision enhances picture quality with an expanded range of contrast and superior brightness. Connect easily with three HDMI inputs, and multiple input/output options. This TV is HDR-compatible, so you can enjoy HDR movies and TV shows. Get your TL3202H today!

From the brand

Christmas Projector Lights

Control the movement speed of the projector light to make the lights dance, create a romantic Christmas atmosphere.

Outdoor & Indoor Use

Red and Green Projector Light

Wall-mounted

【Wide Coverage】With a larger projection area and clearer picture quality, this newest upgraded Christmas light projector can cover up to 3800sf from a distance of 33ft. Anytime, anywhere, create a a cool afffect for you. The power cord of our outdoor star show light is extended to 9.84 ft, which can reach many places. Don’t worry about running out of power outdoors. Perfect for Christmas, birthday parties, festival, party, landscape and wedding decoration
【Remote Control & Timer】50ft barrier free control, easily control the movement speed of the light, change the color of the light. What’s more, this christmas lights outdoor projector has a timer function (0.5h, 3h, 5h and 8h). No need to worry about power consumption, these noiseless rotating light visuals will accompany you into a warm dream
【Easy Installation】Comes with a long ground stake and round base, to insert the projection lamp into the ground or just place on the ground/table/home. Besides, it can also be mounted on th wall. Easy to move to get any areas, it only takes 1 second to create a romantic atmosphere full of stunning illumination!
【Weather Resistance】The outdoor projector light with IP65 waterproof rating, high strength, high toughness. So you do not need to worry about snow, rain, dust and strong sunlight. Rotate the projector head, to fill any place you want with romantic star light (Note: the power plug is IP44 waterproof, do not expose it water or moisture!)

Read more

Christmas Projector Lights Outdoor with Remote Control & Timer, Weather Resistance, Wide Coverage, 6 Patterns

Adjustable projection distance & Super large projection area

  • The best projection distance of this christmas projector light is 16ft-33ft.
  • The upgraded Christmas projector light has a larger projection area and clearer picture quality. Collocated with 360° adjustable projector head, construct a dreamy fairy tale world for you.

Star Shower Christmas Projector Lights Outdoor

With red and green lights blinking on the house, wall, ceiling, and lawn, our Christmas projection lights create a romantic holiday atmosphere

Package Includes

1 x Christmas Projector light

1 x Ground stake

1 x Remote

1 x AC adapter with 3m cable

1 x User instruction

Specification

  • Operating voltages:120V
  • DC adapter:5V 3W
  • Operating temperature: -25℃ to 35℃
  • Material: plastic
  • Waterproof Rank of Light: IP65
  • Waterproof Rank of Plug: IP44
  • Effective removal of the remote control: <15m
  • Scope of application: indoor & outdoor

Read more

Christmas Lights Outdoor Projector

No need for long ladders, complicated installations, troublesome dismantling decorations, or climbing on the house. Say goodbye to traditional hanging string lights. Just turn on our Christmas projector Lights and get a beautiful meteor shower in no time. Great for holiday and commercial ambient decorations, also a fantastic Christmas gift for lover, family, friends, or colleagues.

Flexible Installation

  • Placed on plane; Ground-mounted; Wall-mounted

Read more

Weather Resistance

With IP65 waterproof rating, our christmas lights outdoor projector has high strength, high toughness. Don’t worry about rain, snow, dust, and intense sunlight, enjoy the wonderful and fairy Christmas world.

Wonderful Landscape Spotlight

6 patterns (snowflake, Jingle bell, Christmas tree, Santa Claus, Fireworks and starry sky); 3 working modes (green, red, green and red mixed). Create vivid and beautiful light with the different projector angle.

Outdoor & Indoor Use

Equipped with a round base and ground stake, the star show projector light can be placed anywhere(indoor placement, ground-mounted, wall-mounted). 9.84ft extended power cord solves outdoor wiring issue.

Read more

Remote Control

  • 50ft barrier free control, no point to point operation, easily control the movement speed of the starry projector lamp, change the color of the light.
  • Timer Function: 0.5h, 3h, 5h and 8h on. No need to worry about power consumption, switch the light off at regular intervals.
  • Power cord is 9.84ft. No worry about not being able to touch the power source outdoors.
